channel.title: +1 Forward - The Real Thing
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/the-real-thing-rpg
Rach and Rich bring on Jason Peercy and Jason Ward from Accidental Cyclops to talk about their simple and gritty RPG officially based on the music of Faith No More.
Timecodes: 0:01:47 - Read a Sitch about Using Music in Game Sessions 0:11:18 - Open Your Brain to *The Real Thing* 0:19:27 - Act Under Fire with Plussy and Curtis in a very bad room
Check out the Kickstarter for *The Real Thing* here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jasonward/the-real-thing-rpg
You can find Accidental Cyclops here: https://www.accidentalcyclops.com/ or follow the game on Twitter [@thingrpg](https://twitter.com/ThingRpg) check out Games Mosingo's art here: http://mosingo.com/
